name: Garden Rogue
description:
Play as a rogue gardener and defeat slugs in order to feed and grow your garden. The stronger you plants grow the stronger you become! Defeat the EVIL! king slug who has been terrorizing your plants for long enough.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Left click to attack

Q/Right click to enter pot placing mode(only in base)

Q/Right click again to toggle plant type

Left click to place plant

Space to feed plants and exit base

Credits:

Art & Design: michelle

Gameplay and Sound: sam

Fonts from Humble Fonts by somepx

Pallette: Vinik24
